gpt_scene_description_list: On a city road, there is a bus (bus_1) ahead traveling along the right side of the road.
The bus (bus_1) continues to travel, approaching a pedestrian crossing.
In front of the bus (bus_1), a car (car_2) is traveling in the distance.
On the pedestrian bridge on the left, there is a pedestrian (person_4) walking.
To the right of the bus (bus_1), there is a silver car (car_5) slowing down and preparing to stop.
There is a traffic light (traffic_light_6) and another traffic light (traffic_light_10) on the road ahead, which is an intersection.
There is a bench (bench_11) on the right side of the road.
In the distance, several cars (car_8), (car_9), (car_14), and a motorcycle (motorcycle_19) can be seen.
On the grass on the left, there is another pedestrian (person_17) walking.
Overall, the scene shows a sunny day, good road conditions, and moderate traffic flow.
The ego-vehicle follows the bus (bus_1) and will approach a traffic light-controlled intersection.
